tooltip: Select King Daphnes Nohansen as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: King Daphnes focuses on improving all Cavalry units in a variety of ways.
Allows you to summon King Daphnes, a mounted hero who tramples his enemies.
Daphnes can train Red Lion Knights, mounted heavily armored anti-cavalry units.
Levy and Soldier Cavalry automatically upgrade for free when reaching the Town and City Phase, respectively.
King Daphnes can upgrade the Melee attack damage of all Cavalry units.
